description: Allows you to retrieve metadata about multiple attached files on an associated resource. Each attached file provided in the input list must be associated with the input AssociatedResourceArn.

parameters.name: FileIds
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of the attached file resource. (string) ---

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Connect instance.

parameters.name: AssociatedResourceArn
parameters.description: The resource to which the attached file is (being) uploaded to. The supported resources are Cases and Email.

nested_items.name: Files
nested_items.description: List of attached files that were successfully retrieved.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time of Creation of the file resource as an ISO timestamp. It's specified in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ. For example, 2024-05-03T02:41:28.172Z.

nested_items.name: FileArn
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the attached file resource (ARN).

nested_items.name: FileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the attached file resource.

nested_items.name: FileName
nested_items.description: A case-sensitive name of the attached file being uploaded.

nested_items.name: FileSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the attached file in bytes.

nested_items.name: FileStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the attached file.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Represents the identity that created the file.

nested_items.name: ConnectUserArn
nested_items.description: An agent ARN representing a connect user.

nested_items.name: AWSIdentityArn
nested_items.description: STS or IAM ARN representing the identity of API Caller. SDK users cannot populate this and this value is calculated automatically if ConnectUserArn is not provided.

nested_items.name: FileUseCaseType
nested_items.description: The use case for the file.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceArn
nested_items.description: The resource to which the attached file is (being) uploaded to. Cases are the only current supported resource.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: List of errors of attached files that could not be retrieved.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: Why the attached file couldn't be retrieved.

nested_items.name: FileId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the attached file resource.
